title: Indiana Jones
description: Archaeologist and adventurer Indiana Jones is hired by the U.S. government to find the Ark of the Covenant before the Nazis do.

title: Back to the Future
description: Teenager Marty McFly travels back in time in a DeLorean and must ensure his parents meet to safeguard his own existence.

title: Fight Club
description: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soapmaker form an underground fight club that evolves into something far more.

title: Gladiator
description: A betrayed Roman general fights as a gladiator while seeking vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family.
